item.title: Americas West Asia myopia continues
item.description: Barack Obamas plan to form a coalition to tackle ISIS sounds more like George W Bushs flawed War on Terror writes Viju Cherian
item.itunes:subtitle: Barack Obamas plan to form a coalition to tackle ISIS sounds more like George W Bushs flawed War on Terror writes Viju Cherian
item.itunes:summary: Barack Obamas plan to form a coalition to tackle ISIS sounds more like George W Bushs flawed War on Terror writes Viju Cherian

item.title: Dredging the Ganga will upset its ecosystem
item.description: Rivers when used for commercial navigation are at anbsp risk of different kinds of pollutions The Ganga already struggling from very high levels of domestic and industrial pollutants can certainly do without an additional source of pollution
item.itunes:subtitle: Rivers when used for commercial navigation are at anbsp risk of different kinds of pollutions The Ganga already struggling from very high levels of domestic and industrial pollutants can certainly do without an additional source of pollution
item.itunes:summary: Rivers when used for commercial navigation are at anbsp risk of different kinds of pollutions The Ganga already struggling from very high levels of domestic and industrial pollutants can certainly do without an additional source of pollution

item.title: There should be a coolingoff period for exjudges
item.description: After retirement many judges join lucrative arbitration work which I think should also be subjected to a coolingoff period Instead of doing this they can take up other challenges writes Mool Chand Sharma
item.itunes:subtitle: After retirement many judges join lucrative arbitration work which I think should also be subjected to a coolingoff period Instead of doing this they can take up other challenges writes Mool Chand Sharma
item.itunes:summary: After retirement many judges join lucrative arbitration work which I think should also be subjected to a coolingoff period Instead of doing this they can take up other challenges writes Mool Chand Sharma

item.title: IndiaJapan ties blossom at the confluence of ModiAbenomics
item.description: Narendra Modis visit to Japan has created a new paradigm of cooperation between the two countries Modi and Japanese PM Shinzo Abe are decisive leaders aiming at accelerating growth momentum writes NK Singh
item.itunes:subtitle: Narendra Modis visit to Japan has created a new paradigm of cooperation between the two countries Modi and Japanese PM Shinzo Abe are decisive leaders aiming at accelerating growth momentum writes NK Singh
item.itunes:summary: Narendra Modis visit to Japan has created a new paradigm of cooperation between the two countries Modi and Japanese PM Shinzo Abe are decisive leaders aiming at accelerating growth momentum writes NK Singh

item.title: Dear Chetan Bhagat you suggest homosexuality must be tolerated Why
item.description: Surely liberties are grounded in the doctrine of humanity not numbers and even if there are 10 queer people it is reason enough to grant them their due A letter by Dhruba Jyoti Purkait
item.itunes:subtitle: Surely liberties are grounded in the doctrine of humanity not numbers and even if there are 10 queer people it is reason enough to grant them their due A letter by Dhruba Jyoti Purkait
item.itunes:summary: Surely liberties are grounded in the doctrine of humanity not numbers and even if there are 10 queer people it is reason enough to grant them their due A letter by Dhruba Jyoti Purkait

item.title: The Rest cannot be passive spectators
item.description: While the European powers fought among themselves Asian African and Arab nations were the oppressed majority whose resources were used to enrich the West Developing countries should counter the Wests dominance by taking a more active role in world affairs
item.itunes:subtitle: While the European powers fought among themselves Asian African and Arab nations were the oppressed majority whose resources were used to enrich the West Developing countries should counter the Wests dominance by taking a more active role in world affairs
item.itunes:summary: While the European powers fought among themselves Asian African and Arab nations were the oppressed majority whose resources were used to enrich the West Developing countries should counter the Wests dominance by taking a more active role in world affairs

item.title: Expect no concessions on sovereignty in Xis India visit
item.description: When PM Narendra Modi meets 61yearold Chinese President Xi Jinping next week he will meet a selfconfident intelligent individual with wide administrative experience who is comfortable with the exercise of power writes Jayadeva Ranade
item.itunes:subtitle: When PM Narendra Modi meets 61yearold Chinese President Xi Jinping next week he will meet a selfconfident intelligent individual with wide administrative experience who is comfortable with the exercise of power writes Jayadeva Ranade
item.itunes:summary: When PM Narendra Modi meets 61yearold Chinese President Xi Jinping next week he will meet a selfconfident intelligent individual with wide administrative experience who is comfortable with the exercise of power writes Jayadeva Ranade

item.title: Uttarakhand to Kashmir We are a disaster when it comes to disasters
item.description: Many hoped that the Uttarakhand tragedy would be a valuable lesson to the states and governmentfunded institutions that tackle such disasters But regrettably as we see in Jammu and Kashmir no lessons were learnt writes KumKum Dasgupta Letup in rains army airlifts engineers to set up wireless unitsnbsp VOTE Should India treat disaster management as a priority
item.itunes:subtitle: Many hoped that the Uttarakhand tragedy would be a valuable lesson to the states and governmentfunded institutions that tackle such disasters But regrettably as we see in Jammu and Kashmir no lessons were learnt writes KumKum Dasgupta Letup in rains army
item.itunes:summary: Many hoped that the Uttarakhand tragedy would be a valuable lesson to the states and governmentfunded institutions that tackle such disasters But regrettably as we see in Jammu and Kashmir no lessons were learnt writes KumKum Dasgupta Letup in rains army airlifts engineers to set up wireless unitsnbsp VOTE Should India treat disaster management as a priority

item.title: Going by the book might not be a good idea
item.description: For Modi presenting a Tagore or discussing Morita would have been an easier way of drawing out the Japanese Emperor
item.itunes:subtitle: For Modi presenting a Tagore or discussing Morita would have been an easier way of drawing out the Japanese Emperor
item.itunes:summary: For Modi presenting a Tagore or discussing Morita would have been an easier way of drawing out the Japanese Emperor

item.title: India is driving down the wrong lane
item.description: In India people dont take road accidents seriously According to the National Crime Records Bureau 136834 people were killed in road accidents in 2010
item.itunes:subtitle: In India people dont take road accidents seriously According to the National Crime Records Bureau 136834 people were killed in road accidents in 2010
item.itunes:summary: In India people dont take road accidents seriously According to the National Crime Records Bureau 136834 people were killed in road accidents in 2010

item.title: To be counted during Paris summit India must cut its carbon footprint
item.description: The Paris summit can prove a watershed if India dovetails its moves to provide energy to at least the poorest 50 million people which can also represent Indias commitment to reducing emissions on a planetary scale writes Darryl DMonte
item.itunes:subtitle: The Paris summit can prove a watershed if India dovetails its moves to provide energy to at least the poorest 50 million people which can also represent Indias commitment to reducing emissions on a planetary scale writes Darryl DMonte
item.itunes:summary: The Paris summit can prove a watershed if India dovetails its moves to provide energy to at least the poorest 50 million people which can also represent Indias commitment to reducing emissions on a planetary scale writes Darryl DMonte

item.title: NDA pursuing antiadivasi agenda in the name of countering Maoists
item.description: The invocation of the single IGDIG command with Punjabs KPS Gill as a model is like an open invitation to unchecked authority starting with the posting of SRP Kalluri as IG Bastar range
item.itunes:subtitle: The invocation of the single IGDIG command with Punjabs KPS Gill as a model is like an open invitation to unchecked authority starting with the posting of SRP Kalluri as IG Bastar range
item.itunes:summary: The invocation of the single IGDIG command with Punjabs KPS Gill as a model is like an open invitation to unchecked authority starting with the posting of SRP Kalluri as IG Bastar range

item.title: Cautious Obama frustrates others
item.description: President Barack Obama may have in his mind a very clear picture of what he wants to do with the ISIS and his critics see him stumbling from one misquote to another

item.title: Dont water down our river cleaning efforts
item.description: The NDAs plan to clean and rejuvenate the Ganga will be appreciated by all only if it extends the same courtesy to other rivers

item.title: Turn the light on innovation and investment
item.description: Yet again the summer of 2014 saw India reeling from the energy crises as temperatures hit a record high in six decades According to a 2014 World Bank study Indias energy sector problems keep 300 million without power
item.itunes:subtitle: Yet again the summer of 2014 saw India reeling from the energy crises as temperatures hit a record high in six decades According to a 2014 World Bank study Indias energy sector problems keep 300 million without power
